fields.headline: Pick of the week: Comedy
fields.bodyText: 99 Club Leicester Square Storm, WC2 Saturday 2 Duncan Edwards hosts an eclectic night of comedic wit and observational acumen at the well-run club with oddball Paul Foot and posh boy Will Smith. Louis CK Soho Theatre, W1 Saturday 2, Tuesday 5 to Friday 8 Bad-taste comedy on the futility of family life with one of America's hottest stars. Robert White The Adelaide, NW3, Saturday 2; Downstairs At The King's Head, N8, Sunday 3; The Leather Exchange, SE1, Wednesday 6 The only "socially autistic, dyslexic, cross-lateral, gay, quarter-Welsh, ex-con, web-toed comedian" around. Robin Ince: Bleeding Heart Liberal Liberties Bar, NW1 Monday 4, Thursday 7, Friday 8 Expect plenty of hilarious rants in this work in progress from cardigan-wearing founder of the Book Club and School For Gifted Children.
